word: TO SUMMARIZE, THE E. G. WHITE MATERIALS IN THE FILES OF LETTERS AND DOCUMENTS TOUCHING ON AFRICA CONSIST OF COUNSELS TO MISSIONARIES AND LEADERS IN AFRICA, TO BELIEVERS, AND ESPECIALLY TO MEMBERS OF THE WESSELS FAMILY. IT INCLUDES COUNSEL TO INDIVIDUALS, SOME OF IT VERY PERSONAL AND APPLYING TO PARTICULAR SITUATIONS. THERE ARE OBSERVATIONS POINTING OUT MISTAKES IN METHOD, MANY EXHORTATIONS, STATEMENTS OF PRINCIPLES APPLYING TO THE WORK, AND MANY PAGES OF DEEPLY SPIRITUAL INSTRUCTION.
